Nov. 28, 1942 D South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association (A Section)
South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association (A Section) 10 Test Piece Contest South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association south-wales-monmouthshire-brass-band-association-a
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Town Hall, Pontypridd 38th annual contest. 3 bands competed.
March 2, 2013, 10:28 a.m. Jan. 30, 2019, 3:27 p.m.
1 Cory Band Reg Little Robin Hood [Geehl]
2 Aberaman Arthur Smith Halevy [arr. Round]
3 Parc and Dare Band W. Haydn Bebb Themes from Symphony No. 5 [Beethoven]
